item.title: Archer's Wonder
item.author: Peter Barnardo,
item.description: Imagine the strength in the voice of Adele, the soul of Corinne Bailey Rae and the mellow vibe of Regina Spektor in one artist. Ever since starting her vocal career at the WOMAD festival in 2007, Sally Archer has performed in many gigs around the country and has recorded in Abbey Road Studios. Her â€¦
